DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: Roles - root OU rules
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Roles available only in the root OU

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The root administrator has all permissions in OpenCms. He automatically has all other roles - because he has the rights of these roles. The predefined user Admin is root administrator. The role is important and at least the Admin user should have this role.
